text: Marseille Provence Airport () is an international airport in Marignane, France. It is northwest of Marseille. The airport was founded on 22 October 1922. In 2023, it had 10,800,254 passengers. The airport is a focus city for Air France. It is also the base for Ryanair. == Other websites == * Marseille Provence Airport Official website * * Category:1922 establishments in Europe Category:1920s establishments in France Category:Airports in France Category:Buildings and structures in Marseille
title: Marseille Provence Airport
